javelin.controller.ai

Class AiThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • javelin.controller.ai.AiThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AiThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Efficiently uses a CPU core to run an AbstractAlphaBetaSearch. When the search is done it starts a new one using the same thread, to avoid creating more than threads than there are CPUs available.
    Author:
    alex
